WorkItem.ClosedComment: One of the reasons you want this to be case-sensitive is when you're development environment is different from your hosting environment. For example Windows vs. Linux.
WorkItem.Description:
Nothing to add here, really.

Depending on the host OS, file/directory names can be case-sensitive or not, but the TS compiler doesn't use the OS for looking up files for some reason. This is extremely inconvenient sometimes and causes significant time loss.

Why can't TS just use the OS to lookup files?
